mapper.select: select * from cms_content where category_id='3' and auth_status='2' and is_deleted='0' order by gmt_create desc limit 0,3
select * from cms_content where category_id='2' and auth_status='2' and is_deleted='0' order by gmt_create desc limit 0,5

SELECT t.type_name, b.* FROM book AS b INNER JOIN `material_type` t ON t.`id` = b.`type`
and ( SUBSTRING_INDEX(SUBSTRING_INDEX(CONCAT(t.path,'-',t.id),'-', (select cast( (CHAR_LENGTH(path)-CHAR_LENGTH(REPLACE(path,'-','')))/CHAR_LENGTH('-')+2 as decimal(9,2) ) from material_type where id = cast(#{type} as decimal(9,2))) ),'-',-1) = #{type} or t.id = #{type} )
limit ${startrows},10

select t.title, t.id, t.mid, t.summary, t.gmt_create, c.realname from cms_content t left join writer_user c on t.author_id=c.id where t.category_id='1' and t.auth_status='2' and t.is_deleted='0' order by gmt_create desc limit 0,#{endrow}
SELECT max(b.type) type,t.note FROM book b join material_type t on b.type=t.id where t.path like #{typepath} GROUP BY t.note ORDER BY sum(b.clicks) desc,LENGTH(t.note) LIMIT 0,10
select t.title, b.realname, b.avatar from cms_content t left join writer_user b on t.author_id=b.id where category_id='58' order by clicks desc limit 0,4

SELECT u.id, b.id id1, b.bookname, b.image_url, c.content, c.score, u.realname FROM book AS b INNER JOIN (SELECT * from book_user_comment GROUP BY book_id HAVING is_auth = 1 AND is_hide = 0 AND is_deleted = 0)AS c ON b.id = c.book_id INNER JOIN writer_user AS u ON c.writer_id = u.id ORDER BY b.comments ASC

SELECT t.type_name, b.* FROM book AS b inner JOIN material_type AS t ON b.type = t.id and SUBSTRING_INDEX(SUBSTRING_INDEX(CONCAT(t.path,'-',t.id),'-', (select cast( (CHAR_LENGTH(path)-CHAR_LENGTH(REPLACE(path,'-','')))/CHAR_LENGTH('-')+2 as decimal(9,2) ) from material_type where id = cast(#{type} as decimal(9,2))) ),'-',-1) = #{type} where b.is_on_sale = 1 ORDER BY b.sales DESC limit 0,6
select * from material_type where parent_id=#{parent_id} order by sort
